name: Anti-Designator Fire Projector, Modified (ModaDFP-j13)
description: Modified version of the anti-designator fire projector. The weapon senses the effects of a fire designator and can be set to automatically fire at the designator or wait for a manual command.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
